page.title: 07TOURISM
page.content: The area we are covering is fairly popular with tourists. A lot of people come from the south of Scotland, England or even from abroad. In our block there is a caravan site and houses with bed and breakfast available fot the tourists. While they are staying on the caravan site, people can walk on the beach or the children might play on the swings. There is a shop on the site which sells food and newspapers. There is room for a hundred touring vans and there are showers, toilets and laundry facilities. The cost for one night is Â£3.45 or Â£4.10 at the height of the season. Some of the houses in the area provide bed and breakfast. My mum has got room for 5 people. Although we can make lunch and dinner, most people go away for the day.
